Default settings are per the FCC manual. They may not be accurate.. ==Links of Interest== *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/oldwiki/openwrtdocs/hardware/meraki/mini On the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] *[http://www.sown.org.uk/wiki/Meraki On the '''SOWN''' Wiki] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== Supported by dd-wrt as of = Meraki build Please insert instructions here ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts====
